mapper.select: select r.name, c.id, c.seq, c.votenum from resident r, candidate c where r.id= c.id and c.seq =#{seq} and c.state ='ing' order by voteNum
mapper.insert: insert into candidate( seq, id, job, gender, content, votenum ) values( #{seq}, #{id}, #{job}, #{gender}, #{content}, nvl((select max(votenum) from candidate where seq=#{seq}),0)+1 )
